entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 1:43 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023
